item.title: CVE-2021-27782|2024-08-03T21:33:15.676Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20mobile
item.description: HCL BigFix Mobile / Modern Client Management Admin and Config UI passwords can be brute-forced. User should be locked out for multiple invalid attempts.
